name: DEEPA BABY
company_address: ROOM NO L3 HEAVENLY PLAZA, VAZHAKKALA, KAKKANAD, COCHIN, KERALA/INDIA, 682021
my_business:
D3S Cochin Photography – Professional Wedding & Event Photographers in Kochi
D3S Cochin is a premier photography and videography company based in Kochi, Kerala, specializing in candid wedding photography, pre-wedding shoots, maternity and newborn photography, family portraits, and corporate event coverage.
top_product: AI-Based Instant Photo Delivery System Revolutionizing event photography with face recognition technology. Guests can instantly access their own photos via QR code — ideal for weddings, corporate events, and BNI meetings. Wedding Photography & Videography Packages Full-day candid and traditional coverage, including cinematic wedding films, highlight reels, and social media edits. Special expertise in Christian and destination weddings. Pre-Wedding & Save-the-Date Shoots Creative, cinematic shoots that capture your story in scenic locations — perfect for announcements and social sharing. Maternity Photography Safe, gentle, and beautifully styled sessions for expecting mothers, and families, eitther at home or outdoors Family Portrait Sessions & Lifestyle Shoots Timeless portraits captured candidly or classically — ideal for milestones, reunions, or annual family updates. Event Coverage for Birthdays, Baptisms & Anniversaries Professional photography and video for life’s special moments with fast delivery and curated album options. Corporate & Branding Visuals High-quality photo and video coverage for events, brand launches, conferences, and personal branding — trusted by top corporate clients.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is anyone planning a significant life or corporate event in Kerala or abroad—such as weddings (especially destination weddings), pre/post‑wedding shoots, maternity sessions, newborn or family portraits, birthdays, baptisms, anniversaries, and corporate gatherings, inaugurations, product shoots, e commerce shoots etc. I particularly welcome couples and families seeking timeless, candid yet artful storytelling, as well as corporate clients who want high‑impact visuals from conferences, meetups, or branding events.
top_problem_solved: At D3S Cochin Photography, we solve a common problem: guests and clients waiting days (or even weeks) to see their event photos. Using our AI-based face recognition photo delivery system, we provide instant, personalized access to photos — even during the event! Our system automatically detects and tags faces, so guests can find only their own photos instantly by simply scanning a QR code. This means: No more scrolling through thousands of images. Each person receives a custom album sorted just for them. Perfect for BNI events, corporate functions, weddings, and family gatherings. This also makes it easier for us to: Deliver albums faster. Organize high volumes of photos by person or group. Create a better experience for both clients and their guests. Our BNI members benefit by getting: Instant content for social media or marketing during or immediately after events. Easy, AI-sorted collections to create albums or promo materials. A tech-savvy, time-saving solution they can confidently refer to clients.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of our proudest moments as a BNI member was being chosen as the photography partner for BNI Celebrate – Cochin Region, as well as the Onam celebrations organized by the region. These events brought together hundreds of dynamic entrepreneurs, and we were thrilled to capture the energy, connections, and joyful moments. We also showcased our AI-based instant photo delivery system, which allowed members and guests to access their photos in real time — making the experience more engaging and memorable. These events not only strengthened our brand visibility but also opened up valuable connections and new business opportunities through the BNI network. We’re deeply grateful to the BNI Cochin Region leadership for trusting us and giving us the platform to shine. Thank you to all the Cochin region heads for your constant support and for creating such an inspiring business community.

my_favourite_bni_story: When I first joined BNI, I believed it was simply a platform to generate business. But soon, I realised it’s much more than that — it’s a system built on trust, credibility, and genuine relationships. One day, a fellow member passed me a small referral. I treated it with full commitment and delivered my best service. The client was extremely happy and later introduced me to more opportunities. Within a short time, that single referral multiplied into several projects and a long-term business partnership. That experience changed the way I look at BNI. It proved that success in BNI doesn’t come from one big deal — it comes from consistency, trust, and the relationships we build week after week. BNI has truly shown me that when we focus on giving quality, building trust, and maintaining relationships, business automatically follows. Thank you, BNI, for being a network that truly works!

my_business:
I D Design.
Since 2004, we have been catering to the various needs of our clients in  commercial properties, undertaking turn-key projects. Our expertise includes a wide array of dedicated interior decoration solutions for corporate. hospitality, IT environments and so on.
Beyond being a workplace, your office expresses and symbolizes your organization's values and style. It's your brand's visual signature. It represents how you think and work. While we translate those ideals into an appropriate design, an intelligently designed interior anticipates organizational change and easily adapts to new corporate directions.
top_product: Office Interior Design, Dental Clinic Interior Design, Hositality Interior Design
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a business owner, CEO, or decision-maker who is planning to renovate or set up a new commercial space — such as an office, showroom, clinic, restaurant, or hotel. They are looking for a professional team that can handle the complete interior design and execution from start to finish, ensuring both aesthetics and functionality. A great referral would be someone who has just leased or purchased a commercial property and is ready to begin interior work.
top_problem_solved: A client approached I D Design Interiors with a tight deadline to launch their new restaurant. The site had multiple challenges — including heat exposure on the rooftop, lack of proper planning, and budget constraints. We provided a smart design with thermal insulation, efficient space planning, and cost-effective materials without compromising quality. The project was completed on time and within budget, and the restaurant opened as scheduled with great customer response. This project proved how the right design partner can turn pressure into performance.
my_favourite_bni_story: On the day of my feature presentation at BNI Manfest, a visitor attended the meeting and was deeply impressed by my presentation. Shortly after, they approached me and entrusted I D Design Interiors with a major interior design contract. This experience truly highlighted the power of visibility and credibility that BNI offers — turning a single presentation into a significant business opportunity.

top_problem_solved: During the 2018 Kerala flood, We had a Couple for there Honeymoon from Delhi, the day they landed in Kochi International Airport it was the last flight for the day and Airport shutdown dew to flood, As soon as the flood warnings were issued, I immediately contacted the couples to inform them about the situation, ensuring their safety was the top priority. I provided 24/7 assistance, answering calls, addressing concerns, and making real-time changes to bookings. Ensuring the couple feel secure and well-supported was my top priority. And somehow we take them to Trivandrum Airport and change the return ticket date and they fly back home, For them, there plans were disrupted significantly, I worked closely with vendors to arrange for partial refunds or compensation, maintaining goodwill and customer trust. And I'm happy to tell the same Couple came back next year and compensate there Package and went back Happily.
my_favourite_bni_story: BNI didn’t just give me business—it changed me. I learned discipline, confidence, and the power of giving. It improved my lifestyle, my way of thinking, and how I value relationships. BNI is not only about growth in business, it’s about growth in life.
